title: NotBuild插件使用的问题
author: dengyu
txt_content:
在使用notbuild插件的时候，发现即使添加了世界禁止破坏，玩家仍然可以破坏，且后台提示
Could not pass event BlockBreakEvent to Notbuild v1.5
org.bukkit.event.EventException
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:338) ~[JavaPluginLoader$1.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62) ~[RegisteredListener.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.fireEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:507) [SimplePluginManager.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:492) [SimplePluginManager.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.event.CraftEventFactory.callBlockBreakEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:1015) [CraftEventFactory.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        at net.minecraftforge.event.world.BlockEvent$BreakEvent.<init>(BlockEvent.java:89) [BlockEvent$BreakEvent.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        at net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeHooks.onBlockBreakEvent(ForgeHooks.java:480) [ForgeHooks.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ItemInWorldManager.func_73084_b(ItemInWorldManager.java:321) [mx.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ItemInWorldManager.func_73082_a(ItemInWorldManager.java:279) [mx.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer.func_147345_a(NetHandlerPlayServer.java:757) [nh.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.C07PacketPlayerDigging.func_148833_a(SourceFile:53) [ji.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.C07PacketPlayerDigging.func_148833_a(SourceFile:8) [ji.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkManager.func_74428_b(NetworkManager.java:245) [ej.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkSystem.func_151269_c(NetworkSystem.java:173) [nc.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:1013) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:431) [lt.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:831) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:683) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_121]
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at net.FjjKing.NotBuild.BreakBlock(NotBuild.java:35) ~[?:?]
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor180.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_121]
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_121]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:334) ~[JavaPluginLoader$1.class:1.7.10-1614.53]
        ... 18 more同时，其他插件调用BlockBreakEvent的时候仍然会报错，都是空指针异常（java.lang.NullPointerException），求解！

replies.author: dengyu
replies.txt_content:
1345979462 发表于 2017-7-21 17:39
尝试更换插件版本
谢谢你回答问题
首先，NotBuild插件貌似只有一个版本
其次，似乎每个插件都有此问题，并非仅仅只有该插件一个存在，故我推测应该不是插件问题
